description:
Blood Hustle Paradise is a new free to play online browser based RPG packed with awesome features and a great community! 
If you are familiar with Blood Hustle, then this is Blood Hustle on Steroids!
Some of the things that set it apart from Blood Hustle and make action packed and fast paced are:
In Blood Hustle Paradise there is no Level cap, the Exp gains for Crimes and Attacks are greater, the Weapons are more powerful, higher stat gains at the Gym, Online attack limit increased to 5, no restrictions whatsoever on Gang Wars. 
There is also a new one click attack system to make your attacks quicker!
Better referral rewards!

• Become a Gang Leader or join an existing one and wage wars against your rivals 
• Wide range of Crimes to do which will help you make some money and progress in the game 
• Casino with some great games like Blackjack, Video Poker, Roulette, Slots and a Multiplayer Texas Hold’em 
• Motorboat Racing Scene, where you can buy a boat, tune it up and compete in individual challenges and in Tournaments 
• Chat and Shoutbox to chat away with the rest of the community 
• A wide range of Multiplayer Games where you can challenge your friends for cash of just plain old fun 
• Horse and Dog Races in which you can take part after buying a pet! Train it and turn your pet into a winner 
• Full blown Property Market where you can own several properties and rent them out for some extra income 
• Create your own Company and run it how you see fit, hopefully making some money out of it 
• Stock Market where you can trade stocks and make a killing 
• Arcade Games with trophies for highest scores 
• And so much more!!! There is just too much to list! 

From the creators of Blood Hustle, Gangster Law, Western Frenzy.
Forget those other games like Island Mafia, iMobsters, Gang Wars, Mafia Wars, this is the one to have!
